outputs.output_descr: The European Union Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine provides support to national services from both countries for better border management in line with European standards and contributes to the settlement of the Transnistria conflict.

The European Union Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine provides support to national services from both countries for better border management in line with European standards and contributes to the settlement of the Transnistria conflict.
The European Union Border Assistance Mission to Moldova and Ukraine aims at enhancing the border and customs management capacities of Moldova and Ukraine.

project_descr: European Union Border Assistance Mission to the Republic of Moldova
